com.mapzen.android.graphics

Class MapzenMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.android.graphics.MapzenMap

  • public class MapzenMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class of the Mapzen Android API and is the entry point for all methods related to the map. You cannot instantiate a MapzenMap object directly. Rather you must obtain one from MapFragment.getMapAsync(OnMapReadyCallback) or MapView.getMapAsync(OnMapReadyCallback).

      • setMyLocationEnabled

        public void setMyLocationEnabled(boolean enabled)
        When enabled, shows icon on map to allow centering map on current location. While enabled, the user's current location will be updated in the background. When disabled, the icon is hidden from the map. To use this function, your app must request permission for Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION and Manifest.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION

      • isMyLocationEnabled

        public boolean isMyLocationEnabled()
        Are we displaying the current location and find me icon.

        Parameters:
        lngLat - Geographic coordinates
        Returns:
        Position in pixels from the top-left corner of the map area (the point may not lie within the viewable screen area)

        Set whether the gesture second can be recognized while first is in progress.
        Parameters:
        first - Initial gesture type
        second - Subsequent gesture type

        second - Subsequent gesture type
        Returns:

      • queueSceneUpdate

        public void queueSceneUpdate(java.lang.String componentPath,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Enqueue a scene component update with its corresponding YAML node value.
        Parameters:
        componentPath - The YAML component path delimited by a '.' (example "scene.animated")
        value - A YAML valid string (example "{ property: true }" or "true")

      • applySceneUpdates

        public void applySceneUpdates()
        Apply updates queued by queueSceneUpdate; this empties the current queue of updates.

      • setZoomButtonsEnabled

        public void setZoomButtonsEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets zoom buttons enabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - if true zoom buttonswill be showed, otherwise they will be hidden.

      • setCompassButtonEnabled

        public void setCompassButtonEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets compass button enabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - if true compass button will be showed, otherwise it will be hidden.

      • drawRoutePins

        public void drawRoutePins(LngLat start,
                          LngLat end)
        Draws two pins on the map. The start pin is active and the end pin is inactive.

      • clearRoutePins

        public void clearRoutePins()
        Clears the start and end pins from the map.

      • drawDroppedPin

        public void drawDroppedPin(LngLat point)
        Draws a dropped pin on the map at the point supplied.

      • clearDroppedPins

        public void clearDroppedPins()
        Clears the dropped pin from the map.

      • drawSearchResult

        public void drawSearchResult(LngLat point)
        Draws a search result on the map at the point supplied. The pin will be active.

      • drawSearchResult

        public void drawSearchResult(LngLat point,
                             boolean active)
        Draws a search result on the map at the point supplied.

      • drawSearchResults

        public void drawSearchResults(java.util.List<LngLat> points)
        Draws search results on the map. All pins are displayed as active.

      • drawSearchResults

        public void drawSearchResults(java.util.List<LngLat> points,
                              int... activeIndexes)
        Draws search results on the map. All pins will be inactive except for the one at the active index supplied.

      • clearSearchResults

        public void clearSearchResults()
        Clears search results from the map.

      • drawRouteLocationMarker

        public void drawRouteLocationMarker(LngLat point)
        Draws route pin at the point supplied.

      • clearRouteLocationMarker

        public void clearRouteLocationMarker()
        Clears route pin from the map.

      • drawRouteLine

        public void drawRouteLine(java.util.List<LngLat> points)
        Draws route line on the map for the points supplied.

      • clearRouteLine

        public void clearRouteLine()
        Clears route line from the map.

      • drawTransitRouteLine

        public void drawTransitRouteLine(java.util.List<LngLat> points,
                                 java.util.List<LngLat> stations,
                                 java.lang.String hexColor)
        Draws transit route line on the map for the points supplied. Also draws station icons for each point.

      • clearTransitRouteLine

        public void clearTransitRouteLine()
        Clears transit route line from the map.

      • setPersistMapData

        public void setPersistMapData(boolean persistOnRecreation)
        By default all MapData objects are removed from the map when it is destroyed. To persist this data such as in the case of orientation changes, use this method.
        Parameters:
        persistOnRecreation - persist MapData across orientation changes

      • setPersistMapState

        public void setPersistMapState(boolean persistStateOnRecreation)
        By default map state is reset when the map is destroyed. To persist this information such as in the case of orientation changes, use this method.
        Parameters:
        persistStateOnRecreation - persist map position/zoom/rotation etc across orientation changes
